data.title: Noah Lyles withdraws from remainder of Olympics after COVID diagnosis
data.meta_description: The 100-metre gold medalist took to Instagram to announce that he had decided to withdraw from the Olympics after news broke of his COVID-19 diagnosis following his bronze medal finish in the 200-metre earlier in the day.
